title: server: reduce unnecesary logs
body:
## Development Task

Enhancement the log level and content for logs:
- [x] `[Warn] [[endpoint.rs:606](http://endpoint.rs:606/)] [error-response] [err="Key is locked (will clean up) primary_lock:` is not helpful and should not be `WARN` level as it's expected when lock is encountered.  https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/15882
